Hi, Trigger➛Payroll Case Record➛Assignment group➛Name,

Query Trigger➛Payroll Case Record➛Number has been assigned to your group.

Short description: Trigger➛Payroll Case Record➛Short description

Thank you.
Payroll Case {{Created_1.current.number}} has been assigned to your group

Hi Trigger➛Payroll Case Record➛Opened by,

Query Trigger➛Payroll Case Record➛Number has been opened for you.

Short description: Trigger➛Payroll Case Record➛Short description

Thank you for your query, the relevant Payroll team will respond to you within 3 working days.
Payroll Case {{Created_1.current.number}} has been opened for you
